validaciones.contraseñaInvalida: The password does not follow formatting instructions

validaciones.nombreInvalidoAlfanumerico: The category name can only contain alphanumeric characters.
validaciones.nombreCategoriaInvalidoTamañoMax: The category name cannot exceed 15 characters.
validaciones.nombreCategoriaInvalidoTamañoMin: The category name must have a minimum of 3 characters.
validaciones.descripcionVacio: The category description cannot be empty.
validaciones.descripcionCategoriaInvalidoAlfanumerico: The category description can only contain alphanumeric characters.
validaciones.descripcionCategoriaInvalidoTamañoMax: The category description cannot exceed 255 characters.
validaciones.descripcionCategoriaInvalidoTamañoMin: The category description must have a minimum of 3 characters.

validaciones.nombreInvalidoAlfanumerico: The event name can only contain alphanumeric characters.
validaciones.nombreEventoInvalidoTamañoMax: The event name cannot exceed 30 characters.
validaciones.nombreEventoInvalidoTamañoMin: The event name must be a minimum of 3 characters.
validaciones.descripcionVacio: The event description cannot be empty.
validaciones.descripcionEventoInvalidoAlfanumerico: The event description can only contain alphanumeric characters.
validaciones.descripcionEventoInvalidoTamañoMax: The event description cannot exceed 255 characters.
validaciones.descripcionEventoInvalidoTamañoMin: The event description must have a minimum of 3 characters.
validaciones.numAsistentesVacio: The number of attendees cannot be empty
validaciones.numAsistentesEventoInvalidoNumerico: The number of attendees must be in numerical format
validaciones.direccionVacio: The event address cannot be empty
validaciones.direccionEventoInvalidoAlfanumerico: The event address can only contain alphanumeric characters
validaciones.direccionEventoInvalidoTamañoMax: The event address cannot be more than 50 characters
validaciones.direccionEventoInvalidoTamañoMin: The event address cannot be less than 5 characters
validaciones.emailVacio: The user email cannot be empty
validaciones.emailInvalido: The email is invalid, example: eXample1@eXample1.com
validaciones.emailInvalidoTamañoMin: The email cannot be less than 3 characters
validaciones.emailInvalidoTamañoMax: The email cannot be more than 40 characters
validaciones.telefonoContactoFormato: The phone number must be made up of 9 numbers

instruccionesContraseña.instruccion1: The password must be between 8 and 16 characters.

mensajes.tituloModalCrear: You are going to create an element from the system
mensajes.tituloModalBuscar: Search a element in the system
mensajes.tituloModalEditar: You are going to edit an element from the system
mensajes.tituloModalVerEnDetalle: Information of the element in the system
mensajes.tituloModalBorrado: You are going to delete an element from the system
mensajes.preguntaModalBorrado: Are you sure you want to delete

cuenta.funcionalidadUsuario: People with the User role have the possibility of having friends with other users and event managers on EventGO. Users will be able to share events of their interest and register for them if they want to participate in them. In addition, they can comment What did you think of the event?
cuenta.funcionalidadGestor: Managers can enjoy all the functionalities of a regular user, that is, they can share events of interest to their friends and register for events. On the other hand, they can also create their own events for the EventGO community
cuenta.funcionalidadAdministrador: The administrator can perform all the functionalities of the system. He can manage the categories of all events, create events and even share them. He has the functionality to moderate user actions within EventGO.

LOGIN_ALFANUMERICO: Login can only contain alphanumeric characters
LOGIN_TAMANHO_MAXIMO: Login cannot have less than 3 characters
Login cannot have more than 15 characters
PASSWORD_ALFANUMERICO: Password can only contain alphanumeric and special characters
PASSWORD_TAMANHO_MAXIMO: Password cannot have less than 3 characters
Password cannot have more than 16 characters
LOGIN_NO_EXISTE: There is no user with that login in the system
LOGIN_PASSWORD_NO_COINCIDEN: Login and password do not match
NOMBRE_ALFABETICO: Name can only contain alphabetical characters
NOMBRE_TAMANHO_MINIMO: Name cannot have less than 3 characters
NOMBRE_TAMANHO_MAXIMO: Name cannot have more than 40 characters
EMAIL_FORMATO: Valid email must have a username with letters, digits, and certain special characters, followed by an "@" symbol and a domain that can contain letters, digits, and special characters, with a dot (.) before the extension that must have at least two letters
EMAIL_TAMANHO_MINIMO: Email cannot have less than 3 characters
EMAIL_TAMANHO_MAXIMO: Email cannot have more than 40 characters
ROL_ALFABETICO: Role can only contain alphabetical characters
ROL_TAMANHO_MINIMO: Role cannot have less than 3 characters
ROL_TAMANHO_MAXIMO: Role cannot have more than 20 characters
DNI_ALFANUMERICO: The DNI only contains letters and numbers
PAIS_ALFABETICO: Country can only contain alphabetical characters
PAIS_TAMANHO_MINIMO: Country cannot have less than 3 characters
PAIS_TAMANHO_MAXIMO: Country cannot have more than 15 characters
LOGIN_YA_EXISTE: A user with that login already exists in the system
EMAIL_YA_EXISTE: A user with that email already exists in the system
DNI_YA_EXISTE: A user with that DNI already exists in the system
RECUPERAR_PASS_OK: A new password has been sent to your email
USUARIO_NO_ENCONTRADO: User not found in the system
EMAIL_NO_ENCONTRADO: Email not found in the system
MAIL_NO_ENVIADO: An error occurred while sending the email
ENVIO_EMAIL_EXCEPTION: An error occurred while sending the email
USUARIO_NO_EXISTE: The user does not exist in the system
NO_EDIRTAR_ROL_ADMINISTRADOR: You cannot edit the role to administrator
NO_ELIMINAR_ADMINISTRADOR: You cannot delete the system administrator
PERMISO_DENEGADO: You are not allowed to perform this action
ARCHIVO_VACIO: You cannot upload an empty file
NOMBRE_CATEGORIA_VACIO: The category name cannot be empty
NOMBRE_CATEGORIA_ALFANUMERICO: The category name can only contain alphanumeric characters
NOMBRE_CATEGORIA_TAMANHO_MINIMO: The category name cannot have less than 3 characters
NOMBRE_CATEGORIA_TAMANHO_MAXIMO: The category name cannot exceed 15 characters
DESCRIPCION_CATEGORIA_VACIO: The category description cannot be empty
DESCRIPCION_CATEGORIA_ALFANUMERICO: The category description can only contain alphanumeric characters
DESCRIPCION_CATEGORIA_TAMANHO_MINIMO: The category description cannot have less than 3 characters
NOMBRE_CATEGORIA_YA_EXISTE: A category with this name already exists in the system
CATEGORIA_NO_EXISTE: The category does not exist in the system
